name: Databot
tagline: A slack bot that naively responds when someone mentions data.
body:
# databot
A *very* simple slack-based bot that listens to conversations that contain the word 'data'. 

Created in Node.js using a [botkit](https://howdy.ai/botkit/) template from [Beep Boop](https://beepboophq.com).

## Usage
When databot is invited to a channel, it will ambiently listen until it hears case-insensitive 'data'. It does not need to be bound by whitespace so 'database' and 'dataset' will trigger action. databot's only response is 

Did someone say **data**?

![databot example](https://github.com/vincentmajor/databot/blob/master/resources/example.png)

### Run in Beep Boop
This repository is connected to Beep Boop so any commits here will automatically deploy to my team.

## Creating your own
### Build a slack bot without Beep Boop or botkit
Follow this [great tutorial](https://www.samdlc.com/a-super-simple-slack-bot-example/) to learn the basics of a locally hosted bot in Node.js.

### Hosting on Beep Boop
Beep Boop is a great, free (for up to three bots) service for hosting bots for slack. I recommend.
